video.title: HawthoRNe
video.synopsis: While still recovering from the loss of her husband, fiery chief nursing officer Christina Hawthorne fights for the well-being of her patients.

episodes.synopsis: A strong and caring hospital nursing director and single mother negotiates the monumental challenges of her job while raising a willful teenager.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: A patient with a potentially fatal aneurysm believes that Christina is his wife and confesses to having an affair.
episodes.title: Healing Time

episodes.synopsis: An overprotective young mother is suspected of poisoning her infant daughter.
episodes.title: Yielding

episodes.synopsis: Christina uncovers a rare disorder that could put an accident victim and her young son in grave danger.
episodes.title: All the Wrong Places

episodes.synopsis: Ray is ordered to keep Amanda Hawthorne's upcoming biopsy a secret, while Christina clashes with the hospital's star surgeon over a brain operation.
episodes.title: The Sense of Belonging

episodes.synopsis: The emergency room is overwhelmed by an unexpected rash of new patients.
episodes.title: Trust Me

episodes.synopsis: During a 24-hour shift, Christina discovers that a young mother-to-be has promised her baby to two couples, who are each paying to adopt the child.
episodes.title: Night Moves

episodes.synopsis: Ray and Candy tangle over an accident victim's decision to risk death for an operation that could help him walk again.
episodes.title: No Guts, No Glory

episodes.synopsis: As Christina and Tom struggle to save the staff from budget cuts, a decision about a stroke victim's treatment puts Kelly at odds with Dr. Marshall.
episodes.title: Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: Tom and Christina disagree about whether to include her close friend in a cancer drug trial.
episodes.title: Hello and Goodbye

episodes.synopsis: With the closing of Richmond Trinity, nurse Christina Hawthorne faces new challenges across town at the failing James River Hospital.
episodes.title: No Excuses

episodes.synopsis: As Christina struggles with what to do about Tom, she battles enormous odds to help a drug-addicted mother get lifesaving heart surgery.
episodes.title: The Starting Line

episodes.synopsis: An accident outside the hospital injures Tom and leaves his best friend clinging to life.
episodes.title: Road Narrows

episodes.synopsis: As Christina struggles with Tom's marriage proposal, the arrival of a critically ill death-row inmate throws the hospital into chaos.
episodes.title: Afterglow

episodes.synopsis: The hospital is swamped with potential organ donors when Camille tries to ensure that 9-year-old twin sisters get kidney transplants.
episodes.title: The Match

episodes.synopsis: As Christina's efforts to be with Tom through his surgery are derailed, she struggles to help a pregnant Afghan woman.
episodes.title: Final Curtain

episodes.synopsis: Christina fights for a friend whose insurance company is refusing to cover treatment for a condition that resulted from her being raped years ago.
episodes.title: Hidden Truths

episodes.synopsis: Christina clashes with the police after her homeless friend Isabel Walsh is charged with kidnapping her disabled son from foster care.
episodes.title: A Mother Knows

episodes.synopsis: Christina assumes that Marcus is at fault after she notices scratches and bruises on Camille.
episodes.title: Picture Perfect

episodes.synopsis: An important review of James River is jeopardized when an accident cuts the hospital's power.
episodes.title: No Exit

episodes.synopsis: On the heels of her wedding to Tom, an attack in the hospital parking lot endangers Christina and her unborn child.
episodes.title: For Better or Worse

episodes.synopsis: While recovering from her attack and struggling to cope with being replaced by Bobbie, Christina tries to protect an abandoned girl.
episodes.title: Fight or Flight

episodes.synopsis: Christina is drawn back to the hospital when Nick asks for help in treating his headstrong mother.
episodes.title: Parental Guidance Required

episodes.synopsis: As the investigation into the death of Christina's attacker strains her relationship with Tom, a dangerous infection spreads through the hospital.
episodes.title: A Fair to Remember

episodes.synopsis: While Camille helps Miles counsel a cancer patient, Nick undergoes a harsh interrogation about his role in the murder of Christina's assailant.
episodes.title: Let Freedom Sing

episodes.synopsis: Christina persuades Nick to throw a birthday party for his ailing mother. Meanwhile, Gail confronts Morrissey about his drinking.
episodes.title: Just Between Friends

episodes.synopsis: With Morrissey in rehab, the no-nonsense board member brought in to serve as interim director has some surprises in store for Christina and Bobbie.
episodes.title: To Tell the Truth

episodes.synopsis: As problems caused by her affair send Christina to a therapist, Tom makes it clear he won't stay on at the hospital if his wife is hired to run it.
episodes.title: Price of Admission

episodes.synopsis: As Christina looks to move beyond her divorce, her plans to leave town are upended by the death of Nick's mother.
episodes.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered

episodes.synopsis: Christina returns to the hospital in the wake of her divorce even as she worries about Nick's sudden disappearance.
episodes.title: A Shot in the Dark
